item.title: PDT 4.0.0 released with Eclipse Neon.0
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 4.0! This release introduce huge performance boost around indexing and code assist. It also include several improvements around PHP 7 support, debugging and editing.

item.title: PDT 3.7.0 released with Eclipse Mars.2
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.7! This release is focused on stability and consistency but also include features like final PHP 7 support, improved PHPDoc and external files support and more.

item.title: PDT 3.6.0 released with Eclipse Mars.1
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.6! This release is focused on stability and consistency but also include features like initial PHP7 support, unused use statements validator and organize use statements command and more.

item.title: PDT 3.5.0 released with Eclipse Mars
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.5! This release is focused on stability and consistency while working with PHP projects. Several new features are also included like redesigned debugger configuration or smart object operator.

item.title: PDT 3.4.0 released with Eclipse Luna SR2
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.4!

item.title: PDT 3.3.2 released!
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.3.2. This is maintenance release.

item.title: PDT 3.3.1 released with Eclipse Luna SR1
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.3.1. This is maintenance release.

item.title: PDT 3.3.0 released with Eclipse Luna
item.description: PDT Team glad to announce new PDT version : 3.3
